General.Name: Herfy Food Services Co
General.Description: Herfy Food Services Company establishes, operates, and franchises restaurants primarily in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates through Restaurants, Meat Factory, and Bakeries. It operates restaurants under HERFY name in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company also produces and sells bakery and pastry products through bakeries and bakery shops under the Herfy Bakeries/Doka name; and meat products. In addition, it provides catering services; purchases and sells land for constructing buildings; and owns, uses, maintains, and leases stores and food store fridges. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: A1 Moroug District, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 11632

2.Name: Mr. Khalid Ahmad Hamad Alsaid
